attributes.action: Abolish Capital gains Tax on assets realised to pay nursing home fees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Payment of nursing home care fees may involve the disposal of assets with a potential laibility to capital gians tax. It would help if capital gains tax could be abolished on assets realised to pay for nursing home fees and increase the amount of money available to defray these fees.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
